abilities.name: God's Judgment
abilities.description: A massive lightning bolt attack unleashed from above with devastating destructive power, capable of instantly eliminating most targets.

abilities.name: Electrical Propulsion
abilities.description: The ability to generate electricity to power the Ark Maxim's flight systems and machinery.

weaknesses.description: As electricity, the Goro Goro no Mi's attacks are completely ineffective against rubber, making Luffy a natural counter.

abilities.name: Body Part Blooming
abilities.description: The ability to sprout body parts on any surface, used in this episode to carry multiple injured people simultaneously.
